analysis.Summary: Vue component CardOrder.vue renders a summary card for a customer order, displaying order status, delivery address and type, order ID, shipping dates, cost breakdown and payment status.
analysis.Purpose: Provide a reusable UI block in the orders module to display detailed information about a single order in a card format.

Components.name: CardOrder
Components.responsibility: Main component that accepts an order object as a prop and renders its details (status, delivery info, totals, payment state).

Functions.name: requestPayment
Functions.description: Placeholder function to dispatch a new payment request for the order.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order object for which to initiate payment.

Functions.name: DateToFormattedString
Functions.description: Formats a given date by adding 6 days and returning it in 'DD/MM' format.

parameters.name: d
parameters.description: Original date or ISO date string.

Functions.name: DateToFormattedString2
Functions.description: Formats a given date by adding 1 day and returning it in 'DD/MM' format.

parameters.name: d
parameters.description: Original date or ISO date string.

analysis.Usage: Imported into parent views or components to display individual orders. Typically used as <CardOrder :order="orderObject"/> within an orders list component or page.
Notes: Some sections of the template and script (product listing, payment status retrieval via store) are commented out, indicating pending or optional features.
cartTotalPrice and payment computed properties are referenced in template but not defined in script (likely expected from global store or mixin).
